dmca.title: [ABUSE] pcAnywhere.com - IP Address 70.85.18.126
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 05, 2005 10:12 AM
To: cconnolly@symantec.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] pcAnywhere.com - IP Address 70.85.18.126]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] pcAnywhere.com - IP Address 70.85.18.126
Date: Tue, 5 Apr 2005 08:06:30 -0700
From: Chansonette Connolly <cconnolly@symantec.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: mightyllc@yahoo.com

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
TPCM
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX

Gentlepersons:

I am writing on behalf of Symantec Corporation. Symantec owns the trademarks
and holds the copyrights for numerous computer software products, including,
but not limited to, a suite of computer utility and antivirus software
products under the U.S. registered trademarks pcAnywhere®, NORTON
SYSTEMWORKS® and NORTON ANTIVIRUS®, and other trademarks.  Symantec also
holds the registered trademark in the U.S. and other countries for its name,
SYMANTEC®.  Symantec
